description:
Modern Family, a show that has never been shy about breaking down barriers, is doing it again. For the first time, the series has cast an openly transgender child actor.《摩登家庭》，是一部从来不会拘泥于“界限”的电视剧，又一次打破下限。这部剧首度迎来了跨性别的小孩。

Eight-year-old actor Jackson Millarker will appear in Wednesday’s episode as Lily’s friend Tom. Lily, of course. is the daughter of same-sex couple Cam (Eric Stonestreet) and Mitchell (Jesse Tyler Ferguson). In the episode titled “A Stereotypical Day”, Lily invites Tom over for a play date.八岁的演员杰克逊将作为莉莉的朋友汤姆出现在金天播出的一集《摩登家庭》。莉莉是同性夫妇卡姆（Eric Stonestreet饰）、米歇尔（Jesse Tyler Ferguson饰）的女儿。这集命名为“特殊的一天”，这集里莉莉和汤姆有一个游戏约会。

Modern Familyairs Wednesdays at 9 PM on ABC.《摩登家庭》周三晚九点在ABC播出。
